Chris Bryant, a Labour David Cameron , demanded that the police carry out the full, transparent, and thorough inquiry into phone hacking that we are still waiting for. "It is one thing to use Andy Coulson in opposition, but to put him on the taxpayer's payroll and at the heart of Government shows that David Cameron is completely unscrupulous," he said.
